proposal: Hello BitTeam and the vibrant community of 157 holders! Impressive to see your wide range of services and the 24/7 support you provide. With our B2B tools, you could add a DEX or a Lottery to your platform, enhancing your revenue stream while giving your users more ways to engage with BTT. Let's turn those 9 currency pairs into a full-fledged DEX. See my profile for demo and details.
